author: Tom Carreras, AI Boost
title: Bitcoin Mining Costs Soar as Hashrate Hits Records: TheMinerMag
description: Public miners race to scale as Bitcoin’s hashrate nears the zetahash threshold.

 miners are facing mounting pressure as the networks hashrate and difficulty continue to climb, tightening margins even as bitcoins price holds steady, according to TheMinerMags monthly rep… [+1493 chars]
